com.google.appinventor.yailgenerator

Class YailGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.yailgenerator.YailGenerator

  • public class YailGenerator
extends Object
    YailGenerator is used to generate YAIL without having to open codeblocks.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Entry point for YailGenerator binary. Command-line argumesnt:
        1. the path of a file containing the form properties source
        2. the path of a file containing the codeblocks source
        3. the yail path

        The generated YAIL is printed to stdout.
